doc.description:
Driver to get ranging data from Decawave DW1000 modules connected to Arduino
Decawave DW1000 modules (http://www.decawave.com/products/dwm1000-module) are Ultra-Wide-Band devices that can be used for communication and ranging. Especially, using 3 modules as anchors can provide data for a localization system based on trilateration. The DW1000 is using a SPI connection, but an arduino-compatible board can be used with the library https://github.com/thotro/arduino-dw1000 to hyde the low level drivers and provide direct ranging informations.

configure.name: DW1000_ARDUINO_UART
configure.description: UART on which arduino and its DW1000 module is connected

configure.name: DW1000_USE_AS_LOCAL_POS
configure.description: use as a local positioning system (default: TRUE)

configure.name: DW1000_USE_AS_GPS
configure.description: use as a fake GPS positioning system (default: FALSE)

define.name: ANCHORS_IDS
define.description: Comma separated list of anchors ID

define.name: ANCHORS_POS_X
define.description: Comma separated list of anchors ID over X axis

define.name: ANCHORS_POS_Y
define.description: Comma separated list of anchors ID over Y axis

define.name: ANCHORS_POS_Z
define.description: Comma separated list of anchors ID over Z axis

define.name: OFFSET
define.description: Position offset other X, Y and Z axis

define.name: SCALE
define.description: Position scale factor other X, Y and Z axis

define.name: INITIAL_HEADING
define.description: Initial heading correction between anchors frame and global frame

define.name: NB_ANCHORS
define.description: Set number of anchors, only 3 are required/supported at the moment

define.name: USE_EKF
define.description: Enable EKF filtering, required to estimate speed

define.name: EKF_R_SPEED
define.description: EKF noise on speed measurements (if available)

define.name: NOISE_X|Y|Z
define.description: Noise level reported by the POSITION_ESTIMATE message when USE_AS_LOCAL_POS is activated

define.name: VEL_NOISE_X|Y|Z
define.description: Noise level reported by the VELOCITY_ESTIMATE message when USE_AS_LOCAL_POS is activated

makefile.raw: ifeq (,$(findstring $(DW1000_USE_AS_GPS),0 FALSE)) ifdef SECONDARY_GPS ifneq (,$(findstring $(SECONDARY_GPS), dw1000)) # this is the secondary GPS $(TARGET).CFLAGS += -DGPS_SECONDARY_TYPE_H=\"modules/decawave/dw1000_arduino.h\" $(TARGET).CFLAGS += -DSECONDARY_GPS=GPS_DW1000 else $(TARGET).CFLAGS += -DGPS_TYPE_H=\"modules/decawave/dw1000_arduino.h\" $(TARGET).CFLAGS += -DPRIMARY_GPS=GPS_DW1000 endif else # plain old single GPS usage $(TARGET).CFLAGS += -DGPS_TYPE_H=\"modules/decawave/dw1000_arduino.h\" endif endif
